abstract.p: This document, number fifteen in Carlo Conti Rossini's edition (and therefore CCR 15 according to Bausi's reference). It is attested only once on a folium verso of CCR 12 and 13 . On the verso of the following part of this document there are CCR 32 and CCR 16 , as well as an added note .
